papers.title: Quantum-enhanced quantum dots electrodes for coherent electron transfer in bioelectrochemical systems
papers.abstract: Quantum coherence effects in quantum dots enable unprecedented electron transfer rates through quantum tunneling mechanisms, achieving 40154 mW/m² with 56.5% quantum efficiency.
papers.methodology: Quantum coherence maintained through cryogenic operation and electromagnetic shielding

papers.title: AI-designed synthetic microbial consortia with shape memory alloys interfaces achieving autonomous optimization

papers.abstract: Bioengineered neural networks directly control microbial electron transfer pathways through bioelectrical interfaces, achieving 15000 mW/m² with 85% neural-microbial coupling efficiency.
